Business Description: Advanced Filtration Systems Inc. manufactures liquid filters. The companyâ€™s products are used in various oil, lube, and fuel filtration applications in engine and hydraulic, and water separation systems. It serves customers in Europe, North and South America, Asia, Africa, and Australia. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Champaign, Illinois. Advanced Filtration Systems Inc. is a joint venture of Donaldson Company, Inc. and Caterpillar Inc.

Industry: Advanced Tri-Gen Power Systems, LLC operates as a subsidiary of Caterpillar Inc.

Business Description: AFSI Europe s.r.o. is a joint venture of Donaldson Company, Inc. and Caterpillar Inc.

Anchor Coupling Inc. designs, manufactures, and supplies hydraulic hose assemblies and couplings for large and small original equipment manufacturers in the United States and internationally. It offers braided, hydraulic suction, high and low pressure spiral, thermoplastic single fabric, teflon/stainless, compact wire braid, working pressure, rubber, brake, wire, and bulk hoses; and specialty hoses with reduced bend radius and high abrasion covers for applications with high temperature capabilities. The company also offers bulk fittings, hose assemblies, and tubes; and hydraulic hose assemblies for fluid power applications. Anchor Coupling Inc. was founded in 1938 and is based in Menominee, Michigan with coupling manufacturing plants in Menominee, Michigan; and Oxford, Mississippi. The company has hose manufacturing plants in Italy; and West Plains, Missouri. It has assembly fabrication plants in Dixon and Sterling, Illinois; Goldsboro, North Carolina; Belgium; and the United Kingdom. Anchor Coupling Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Caterpillar Inc.

Asia Power (Private) Limited develops, owns, and operates an electric power plant in Sapugaskanda, Sri Lanka. It operates a diesel-fired power plant with a generation capacity of 51 MW. The company sells electrical energy to the Ceylon Electricity Board. Asia Power (Private) Limited is based in Colombo, Sri Lanka.

Asia Power Systems (Tianjin) Ltd. manufactures generator sets under the brands FG Wilson and Olympian. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Tianjin, China. Asia Power Systems (Tianjin) Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Caterpillar Inc.

AsiaTrak (Tianjin) Ltd. manufactures undercarriage products for original equipment manufacturers of excavator and bulldozer machines. It offers track groups, track rollers, and carrier rollers. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Tianjin, China. AsiaTrak (Tianjin) Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Caterpillar Inc.

Atlas Heavy Engineering Pty Ltd. designs, manufactures, and supplies attachments and engineering solutions for construction and industrial, earthmoving, demolition and recycling, quarry and mining, forestry, and general fabrication sectors in Australia. It also offers excavator buckets, loader buckets, auto lock quick hitches, rippers, blades, pulverizsers/processors, grabs and shears, and compactors; and other equipment, including loader couplers, loader rippers, log forks, material handling arms, and pallet forks. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Narangba, Australia.

Asia Power (Private) Limited develops, owns, and operates an electric power plant in Sapugaskanda, Sri Lanka. It operates a diesel-fired power plant with a generation capacity of 51 MW. The company sells electrical energy to the Ceylon Electricity Board. Asia Power (Private) Limited is based in Colombo, Sri Lanka.
